findings.title: S3 Bucket Versioning Disabled
findings.description: Bucket aws-cloudtrail-logs-897722675681-cd4b223c does not have versioning enabled
findings.recommendation: Enable versioning to protect against accidental deletion/modification

findings.title: IAM User with Access Keys but No MFA
findings.description: User Ram has programmatic access but no MFA enabled
findings.recommendation: Enable MFA for all users with programmatic access

findings.title: CloudTrail Logs Not Encrypted with KMS
findings.description: CloudTrail saivarma-ccsk-cloudtrail logs are not encrypted with KMS
findings.recommendation: Enable KMS encryption for CloudTrail logs
